verses.verse: וְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> So all Israel הִתְיַחְשׂ֔וּ <WH3187> were reckoned by genealogies וְהִנָּ֣ם <WH2009> and behold כְּתוּבִ֔ים <WH3789> and behold they [were] written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> in the book מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וִיהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> and Judah הָגְל֥וּ <WH1540> [who] were carried away לְבָבֶ֖ל <WH894> to Babylon בְּמַעֲלָֽם׃ <WH4604> for their transgression ס

וְהַיּוֹשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> inhabitants הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ים <WH7223> Now the first אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בַּאֲחֻזָּתָ֖ם <WH272> that [dwelt] in their possessions בְּעָרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5892> in their cities יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> [were] the Israelites הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> Levites וְהַנְּתִינִֽים׃ <WH5411> and the Nethinims

וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> And in Jerusalem יָשְׁב֔וּ <WH3427> dwelt מִן־ <WH4480> Some בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וּמִן־ <WH4480> Some בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וּמִן־ <WH4480> Some בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> and Manasseh

עוּתַ֨י <WH5793> Uthai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּיה֤וּד <WH5989> of Ammihud בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עָמְרִי֙ <WH6018> of Omri בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אִמְרִ֣י <WH566> of Imri בֶן־ <WH1121> the son [בָּנִימִן־ כ] (בָּנִ֔י ק) (מִן־ <WH1144> Benjamin בְּנֵי־ <WH1137> of Bani פֶ֖רֶץ <WH6557> of Pharez ק) בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah
וּמִן־ <WH4480> From הַשִּׁ֣ילוֹנִ֔י <WH7888> And of the Shilonites עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <WH6222> Asaiah הַבְּכ֖וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn וּבָנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> and his sons

וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> And of the sons זֶ֖רַח <WH2226> of Zerah יְעוּאֵ֑ל <WH3262> Jeuel וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> and their brethren שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְתִשְׁעִֽים׃ <WH8673> and ninety

וּמִן־ <WH4480> From בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> And of the sons בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin סַלּוּא֙ <WH5543> Sallu בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֔ם <WH4918> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הוֹדַוְיָ֖ה <WH1938> of Hodaviah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַסְּנֻאָֽה׃ <WH5574> of Hasenuah

וְיִבְנְיָה֙ <WH2997> And Ibneiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <WH3395> of Jeroham וְאֵלָ֥ה <WH425> and Elah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עֻזִּ֖י <WH5813> of Uzzi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִכְרִ֑י <WH4381> of Michri וּמְשֻׁלָּם֙ <WH4918> and Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <WH8203> of Shephathiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רְעוּאֵ֖ל <WH7467> of Reuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִבְנִיָּֽה׃ <WH2998> of Ibnijah

וַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <WH251> And their brethren לְתֹ֣לְדוֹתָ֔ם <WH8435> according to their generations תְּשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty וְשִׁשָּׁ֑ה <WH8337> and six כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> these אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> he רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> [were] chief אָב֖וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers ס
וּמִן־ <WH4480> From הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> And of the priests יְדַֽעְיָ֥ה <WH3048> Jedaiah וִיהוֹיָרִ֖יב <WH3080> and Jehoiarib וְיָכִֽין׃ <WH3199> and Jachin

וַעֲזַרְיָ֨ה <WH5838> And Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חִלְקִיָּ֜ה <WH2518> of Hilkiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֣ם <WH4918> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צָד֗וֹק <WH6659> of Zadok בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְרָיוֹת֙ <WH4812> of Meraioth בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיט֔וּב <WH285> of Ahitub נְגִ֖יד <WH5057> the ruler בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God ס

וַעֲדָיָה֙ <WH5718> And Adaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <WH3395> of Jeroham בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פַּשְׁח֖וּר <WH6583> of Pashur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַלְכִּיָּ֑ה <WH4441> of Malchijah וּמַעְשַׂ֨י <WH4640> and Maasiai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲדִיאֵ֧ל <WH5717> of Adiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יַחְזֵ֛רָה <WH3170> of Jahzerah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <WH4918> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְשִׁלֵּמִ֖ית <WH4921> of Meshillemith בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אִמֵּֽר׃ <WH564> of Immer

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <WH251> And their brethren רָאשִׁים֙ <WH7218> heads לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <WH1> of their fathers אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> a thousand וּשְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> and seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֑ים <WH8346> and threescore גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <WH1368> men חֵ֔יל <WH2428> very able מְלֶ֖אכֶת <WH4399> for the work עֲבוֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> of the service בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וּמִֽן־ <WH4480> at הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> And of the Levites שְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <WH8098> Shemaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חַשּׁ֛וּב <WH2815> of Hasshub בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַזְרִיקָ֥ם <WH5840> of Azrikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲשַׁבְיָ֖ה <WH2811> of Hashabiah מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons מְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> of Merari

וּבַקְבַּקַּ֥ר <WH1230> And Bakbakkar חֶ֖רֶשׁ <WH2792> Heresh וְגָלָ֑ל <WH1559> and Galal וּמַתַּנְיָה֙ <WH4983> and Mattaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִיכָ֔א <WH4316> of Micah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זִכְרִ֖י <WH2147> of Zichri בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אָסָֽף׃ <WH623> of Asaph

וְעֹבַדְיָה֙ <WH5662> And Obadiah בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁמַֽעְיָ֔ה <WH8098> of Shemaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גָּלָ֖ל <WH1559> of Galal בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְדוּת֑וּן <WH3038> of Jeduthun וּבֶרֶכְיָ֤ה <WH1296> and Berechiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָסָא֙ <WH609> of Asa בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <WH511> of Elkanah הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> that dwelt בְּחַצְרֵ֥י <WH2691> in the villages נְטוֹפָתִֽי׃ <WH5200> of the Netophathites

וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִים֙ <WH7778> And the porters שַׁלּ֣וּם <WH7967> [were] Shallum וְעַקּ֔וּב <WH6126> and Akkub וְטַלְמֹ֖ן <WH2929> and Talmon וַאֲחִימָ֑ן <WH289> and Ahiman וַאֲחִיהֶ֥ם <WH251> and their brethren שַׁלּ֖וּם <WH7967> Shallum הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> [was] the chief

וְֽעַד־ <WH5704> until הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> now בְּשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> gate הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Who hitherto [waited] in the king's מִזְרָ֑חָה <WH4217> eastward הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> like הַשֹּׁ֣עֲרִ֔ים <WH7778> they [were] porters לְמַחֲנ֖וֹת <WH4264> in the companies בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children לֵוִֽי׃ <WH3878> of Levi

וְשַׁלּ֣וּם <WH7967> And Shallum בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son ק֠וֹרֵא <WH6981> of Kore בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶבְיָסָ֨ף <WH43> of Ebiasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קֹ֜רַח <WH7141> of Korah וְֽאֶחָ֧יו <WH251> and his brethren לְבֵית־ <WH1004> of the house אָבִ֣יו <WH1> of his father הַקָּרְחִ֗ים <WH7145> the Korahites עַ֚ל <WH5921> over מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> [were] over the work הָעֲבוֹדָ֔ה <WH5656> of the service שֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> keepers הַסִּפִּ֖ים <WH5592> of the gates לָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle וַאֲבֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <WH1> and their fathers עַל־ <WH5921> had been over מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> [being] over the host יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <WH8104> [were] keepers הַמָּבֽוֹא׃ <WH3996> of the entry

וּפִֽינְחָ֣ס <WH6372> And Phinehas בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְעָזָ֗ר <WH499> of Eleazar נָגִ֨יד <WH5057> was the ruler הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> become עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> over לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> over them in time past יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> [and] the LORD עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

זְכַרְיָה֙ <WH2148> [And] Zechariah בֶּ֣ן <WH1121> the son מְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֔ה <WH4920> of Meshelemiah שֹׁעֵ֥ר <WH7778> [was] porter פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> of the door לְאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

כֻּלָּ֤ם <WH3605> these הַבְּרוּרִים֙ <WH1305> All these [which were] chosen לְשֹׁעֲרִ֣ים <WH7778> to be porters בַּסִּפִּ֔ים <WH5592> in the gates מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> [were] two hundred וּשְׁנֵ֣ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֑ר <WH6240> ten הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> whom בְחַצְרֵיהֶם֙ <WH2691> in their villages הִתְיַחְשָׂ֔ם <WH3187> These were reckoned by their genealogy הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> whom יִסַּ֥ד <WH3245> did ordain דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> David וּשְׁמוּאֵ֥ל <WH8050> and Samuel הָרֹאֶ֖ה <WH7200> the seer בֶּאֱמוּנָתָֽם׃ <WH530> in their set office

וְהֵ֨ם <WH1992> they וּבְנֵיהֶ֜ם <WH1121> So they and their children עַל־ <WH5921> had charge הַשְּׁעָרִ֧ים <WH8179> [had] the oversight of the gates לְבֵית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְבֵ֥ית־ <WH1004> [namely] the house הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle לְמִשְׁמָרֽוֹת׃ <WH4931> by wards

לְאַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> In four רוּח֔וֹת <WH7307> quarters יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become הַשֹּׁעֲרִ֑ים <WH7778> were the porters מִזְרָ֥ח <WH4217> toward the east יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> west צָפ֥וֹנָה <WH6828> north וָנֶֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> and south

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֨ם <WH251> And their brethren בְּחַצְרֵיהֶ֜ם <WH2691> [which were] in their villages לָב֨וֹא <WH935> [were] to come לְשִׁבְעַ֧ת <WH7651> after seven הַיָּמִ֛ים <WH3117> days מֵעֵ֥ת <WH6256> from time אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵ֖ת <WH6256> to time עִם־ <WH5973> with אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> another

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בֶאֱמוּנָ֞ה <WH530> were in [their] set office הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> who אַרְבַּ֙עַת֙ <WH702> the four גִּבֹּרֵ֣י <WH1368> chief הַשֹּׁעֲרִ֔ים <WH7778> porters הֵ֖ם <WH1992> who הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> For these Levites וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> and were over הַלְּשָׁכ֔וֹת <WH3957> and were over the chambers וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> and over הָאֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> and treasuries בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וּסְבִיב֥וֹת <WH5439> round about בֵּית־ <WH1004> the house הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God יָלִ֑ינוּ <WH3885> And they lodged כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> was committed מִשְׁמֶ֔רֶת <WH4931> because the charge וְהֵ֥ם <WH1992> and they in עַל־ <WH5921> charge הַמַּפְתֵּ֖חַ <WH4669> opening וְלַבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> thereof every morning לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> morning

וּמֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> of them עַל־ <WH5921> And [certain] of them had the charge of כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> vessels הָעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <WH5656> the ministering כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בְמִסְפָּ֣ר <WH4557> counted יְבִיא֔וּם <WH935> that they should bring them in וּבְמִסְפָּ֖ר <WH4557> counted יוֹצִיאֽוּם׃ <WH3318> and out

וּמֵהֶ֗ם <WH1992> also מְמֻנִּים֙ <WH4487> [Some] of them also [were] appointed עַל־ <WH5921> over הַכֵּלִ֔ים <WH3627> to oversee the vessels וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and over כָּל־ <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> and all the instruments הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary וְעַל־ <WH5921> and over הַסֹּ֙לֶת֙ <WH5560> and the fine flour וְהַיַּ֣יִן <WH3196> and the wine וְהַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> and the oil וְהַלְּבוֹנָ֖ה <WH3828> and the frankincense וְהַבְּשָׂמִֽים׃ <WH1314> and the spices
וּמִן־ <WH4480> Some בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> And [some] of the sons הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests רֹקְחֵ֥י <WH7543> made הַמִּרְקַ֖חַת <WH4842> the ointment לַבְּשָׂמִֽים׃ <WH1314> of the spices

וּמַתִּתְיָה֙ <WH4993> And Mattithiah מִן־ <WH4480> at הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> [one] of the Levites ה֥וּא <WH1931> who הַבְּכ֖וֹר <WH1060> who [was] the firstborn לְשַׁלֻּ֣ם <WH7967> of Shallum הַקָּרְחִ֑י <WH7145> the Korahite בֶּאֱמוּנָ֕ה <WH530> had the set office עַ֖ל <WH5921> over מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> over the things that were made הַחֲבִתִּֽים׃ <WH2281> in the pans

וּמִן־ <WH4480> Some בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> of the sons הַקְּהָתִ֛י <WH6956> of the Kohathites מִן־ <WH4480> Some אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> And [other] of their brethren עַל־ <WH5921> over לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> bread הַֽמַּעֲרָ֑כֶת <WH4635> row לְהָכִ֖ין <WH3559> to prepare שַׁבַּ֥ת <WH7676> [it] every sabbath שַׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> sabbath ס

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> now these הַ֠מְשֹׁרְרִים <WH7891> And these [are] the singers רָאשֵׁ֨י <WH7218> chief אָב֧וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לַלְוִיִּ֛ם <WH3881> of the Levites בַּלְּשָׁכֹ֖ת <WH3957> [who remaining] in the chambers [פְּטִירִים כ] (פְּטוּרִ֑ים <WH6358> open ק) כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יוֹמָ֥ם <WH3119> day וָלַ֛יְלָה <WH3915> and night עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> were engaged בַּמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> for they were employed in [that] work

אֵלֶּה֩ <WH428> These רָאשֵׁ֨י <WH7218> These chief הָאָב֧וֹת <WH1> fathers לַלְוִיִּ֛ם <WH3881> of the Levites לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֖ם <WH8435> throughout their generations רָאשִׁ֑ים <WH7218> [were] chief אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> who יָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> these dwelt בִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> at Jerusalem פ

וּבְגִבְע֛וֹן <WH1391> And in Gibeon יָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> dwelt אֲבִֽי־ <WH1> the father גִבְע֖וֹן <WH1391> of Gibeon [יְעוּאֵל כ] (יְעִיאֵ֑ל <WH3273> Jeiel ק) וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> whose wife's מַעֲכָֽה׃ <WH4601> [was] Maachah

וּבְנ֥וֹ <WH1121> son הַבְּכ֖וֹר <WH1060> And his firstborn עַבְדּ֑וֹן <WH5658> Abdon וְצ֣וּר <WH6698> then Zur וְקִ֔ישׁ <WH7027> and Kish וּבַ֥עַל <WH1168> and Baal וְנֵ֖ר <WH5369> and Ner וְנָדָֽב׃ <WH5070> and Nadab
וּגְד֣וֹר <WH1446> And Gedor וְאַחְי֔וֹ <WH283> and Ahio וּזְכַרְיָ֖ה <WH2148> and Zechariah וּמִקְלֽוֹת׃ <WH4732> and Mikloth

וּמִקְל֖וֹת <WH4732> And Mikloth הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁמְאָ֑ם <WH8043> Shimeam וְאַף־ <WH637> also הֵ֗ם <WH1992> like נֶ֧גֶד <WH5048> opposite אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <WH251> with their brethren יָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> And they also dwelt בִירֽוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> over against their brethren ס

וְנֵר֙ <WH5369> And Ner הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> קִ֔ישׁ <WH7027> Kish וְקִ֖ישׁ <WH7027> and Kish הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> Saul וְשָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> and Saul הוֹלִ֤יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יְהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <WH3083> Jonathan וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכִּי־ שׁ֔וּעַ <WH4444> and Malchishua וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִינָדָ֖ב <WH41> and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶשְׁבָּֽעַל׃ <WH792> and Eshbaal

וּבֶן־ <WH1121> And the son יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> of Jonathan מְרִ֣יב בָּ֑עַל <WH4807> [was] Meribbaal וּמְרִי־ בַ֖עַל <WH4810> and Meribbaal הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> מִיכָֽה׃ <WH4318> Micah
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons מִיכָ֑ה <WH4318> of Micah פִּית֥וֹן <WH6377> [were] Pithon וָמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4429> and Melech וְתַחְרֵֽעַ׃ <WH8475> and Tahrea

וְאָחָז֙ <WH271> And Ahaz הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יַעְרָ֔ה <WH3294> Jarah וְיַעְרָ֗ה <WH3294> and Jarah הוֹלִ֛יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עָלֶ֥מֶת <WH5964> Alemeth וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַזְמָ֖וֶת <WH5820> and Azmaveth וְאֶת־ <WH853> זִמְרִ֑י <WH2174> and Zimri וְזִמְרִ֖י <WH2174> and Zimri הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹצָֽא׃ <WH4162> Moza

וּמוֹצָ֖א <WH4162> And Moza הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְעָ֑א <WH1150> Binea וּרְפָיָ֥ה <WH7509> and Rephaiah בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son אֶלְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH501> Eleasah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son אָצֵ֥ל <WH682> Azel בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

וּלְאָצֵל֮ <WH682> And Azel שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> had six בָנִים֒ <WH1121> sons וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> are these שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם <WH8034> whose names עַזְרִיקָ֥ם ׀ <WH5840> [are] these Azrikam בֹּ֙כְרוּ֙ <WH1074> Bocheru וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> and Ishmael וּשְׁעַרְיָ֔ה <WH8187> and Sheariah וְעֹבַדְיָ֖ה <WH5662> and Obadiah וְחָנָ֑ן <WH2605> and Hanan אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> these [were] the sons אָצַֽל׃ <WH682> of Azel פ
